tags: None
review:
Dr. Smriti and Dr. Prashant Nanda are really professional dentists. No doubt about their honesty as they suggested me exactly what treatment I needed without adding any extra treatments or costs. I contacted Dr.Prashant about a year ago from Australia to inquire about RTC and he was very helpful in every manner. He replied to my emails within a day and even called me to discuss my case. I never felt any pressure from him to visit India ASAP to do the treatment rather he gave me few tips to keep my pain down. As I planned my trip to India I contacted him and he booked me in very next day . My treatment was very quick as per my requirements and I got my dental implants done too in my second sitting. I have to mention how scared I was before my surgery but I have to give all the credit to Dr. Prashant Nanda who cleared all my doubts and made me super comfortable that helped me in deciding what I want to do. Waiting for my implants to be completed somewhere next year. I'm sure I won't be disappointed. I definitely recommend their clinic to everyone.  Thanks a lot to both the doctors and their lovely staff.
Cheers

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Prashant is exceptionally competent and professional in all spheres of dental treatment. Being 75 years old my dental treatment appeared very complicated to me.However Dr Prashant and his Team performed in exemplary manner in fixing dental implants and bridges to my  full satisfaction.
He grasps the problem efficiently and discusses various options with the patient and mutually decides the best option.Has good hand and one feels comfortable. Dr Sonali working with him is also quite competent.I recommend Dr Prashant Nanda strongly for dental treatment.

tags: None
review:
Doctor throughly checked the mouth, extensively asked questions to get to the root cause of the problem. Then he took a X-ray which he showed us on a big screen to make us understand the severity of the problem alongside showed us more related X rays to make us understand the treatment.. then he discussed the course of treatment. Assured us that it  can all be fixed. jotted down in his prescription the problem which he observed n also the course of action which he will follow in the subsequent visits. He was very transparent about the severity of the problem as well as the procedure.. 
Would highly recommend him..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been to a few dentists in the past and I have gotten my tooth extracted in thr past as well. With Dr Nanda, I had the same apprehension and fear as I did with every other dentist I have visited. He spoke in a very calm manner and explained everything in detail. My wife and I had alot of queries which he patiently answered. When it came to extracting the tooth instead of using pliers and yanking the tooth out, he used a set of different tools which made the whole process less scary. ** ** ****** ************* *** takes care of the small discomforts which his patients face.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I absolutely recommend Dr. Prashant Nanda. I was warmly greeted and made comfortable right from the beginning. I went for a second opinion about my gum surgery. He patiently heard my concern and gave his diagnosis which was right on point. Dr Prashant has Excellent attention to details. He was easily able to identify the reason for my receding gums and suggested the same procedure which I was expecting to hear. He took ample of time to educate me with the right practises I should follow to keep my dental hygiene, got to know more about my family and my work. He values long term relationship and believe me if you are looking for a dentist, he is the only doctor you will love to see!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Prashant Nanda is one of the most amazing people I have ever met. *** **** ** ** ** ********* ******** he is extremely kind and patient. He made sure that I felt minimum discomfort during the implantation procedure, and gave breaks graciously whenever I needed it. Each time he explains what the procedure is, and what effect it will have. He empathizes with the patient's situation and gives them the best possible treatment. Not only Dr. Nanda, the entire staff of clinicians and non-clinicians at the clinic are very pleasant. They are always available to answer any queries, even after the procedure. I couldn't have asked for a better doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Having  dental treatment done by Dr Nanda has been the best ever experience had by me so far. Appointment time was strictly adhered to and there was no waiting. Treatment room was clean and aesthetic. Doctor Nanda attitude was friendly, suave and professional. During my time on his chair, he was very patient with my queries and handled procedure  with total professional competence. Charges were very reasonable.  
   I will recommend him for best experience of dental treatment in Gurgaon. 
  Jagdish Prakash

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a very pleasant experience at Nanda Clinic when I got my teeth extracted for my invasalign treatment. Dr Smriti Nanda and Dr Prashant Nanda both are thorough professionals and my tooth was extracted by Dr Prashant so easily without any pain at all. Literally no pain. It’s a very comforting and homely place. All the staff and everyone is extremely nice. I fully trust this place with all my heart. Thank you :)

tags: None
review:
Amazing !!
*** **** *** * **** **** **** ****
I was here in December , and am back again , worth it despite the long flight from Virginia USA.
Dr. Prashant Nanda is extremely well spoken, ************* *** ****** **********
The staff at his clinic is courteous and efficient.
Ease of getting appointments at either of his clinics conveniently located at Defence Colony, New Delhi, and also at DLF 2 in Gurgaon.
Clean and hygenic environment gives you peace of mind.
I would highly recommend Dr. Nanda's Dental Clinic.

tags: None
review: **** ******* ****** I went in very nervous, but Dr. Nanda and his team were very sweet and extremely understanding, especially considering I had to undergo a really painful procedure and was a nightmare as a patient, screaming and what not? The surgeon Dr. Pradeep not only calmed me down and successfully completed the procedure, he apologized to me as if my pain was his fault (it was not, my tooth being extracted was too close to the nerve). Not once did he tell me to deal with it. I would recommend Dr Nanda's clinic and the entire team without a second's thought. Most importantly, Dr. Nanda is one of the only doctors who took the time before the procedure to sit me down and take me through the entire procedure and prepared me for what I should expect, which was very reassuring.

tags: None
review:
My experience was absolutely wonderful. I was scared considering the experience of some of my friends and my very low treshold of pain, but dr. Prashant was am amazing surgeon: I dind't experience any pain at all from the anesthesia to the post-surgery. It is 30 hours from then and I have no pain at all and it seems I didn't even make it.
He is extremely professional and friendly and understanding at the same time. I am very lucky to have met in my colony such talented doctors as Dr. Prashant and Dr. Smriti, above whom I can say exactly the same things.

tags: None
review: He was excellent, he has placed 3 implants and I am going back later this year for him to put me a bridge of 4 teeth on top of them. I wanted 4 seperate imlants and crowns but he explained that this was better and I have confidence in his expertise. The surgery went very well, even though I was a little nervous, he was able to reassure me. He explains the procedure very well & follow up vist was also good. He called me the day after the implants to make sure I was ok & I feel he is very thorough in his work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a long session with dr nanda on 11th october for tooth implants....it took longer tban usual as i hadnt taken the antibiotics he told me to have...hence i had nerve sensitivity and time was spent on anaesthesia repestedly to numb the sensitivity...if id taken the antibiotic then i would  have my implants done in a shorter time....i feel good after the implants now and yesterday dr nanda also removed my stitches of last week.

review:

Plz, kindly note my problem!
reply_text:
We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you. Our team did try to call and connect with you after the online appointment was booked but unfortunately were unable to speak.

Please accept our apology for the same, we would do our best to attend to you personally in time in the future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: To start with, he was warm and smiled and checked with me how am I doing the moment he saw me. As I told him I am nervous, he smiled. The process was pain free and he kept complimenting me for being cooperative which kept me encouraged through the process even though I could hear heavy very heavy drilling sound during extraction. Later, he gave me his number and told him to contact him anytime if I have any issues. He explained clearly the Dos & Donts and is easily accessible over mobile for any clarification. Grateful for the entire team of Nanda Dental Clinic.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have syringe phobia but the Doctor Who did inject me he did it very gently and soft so that I don't feel in uncomfortable in my body.i was scared about  the extraction process but it was done very quickly and that's beyond my expectations it was an amazing experience,Doctor Prasant Nanda he was very kind,polite and friendly...He did explain me again and again what I have to do before and after the extraction that was really kind of him... And the staff were very professional,freindly and show us a great hospitality to the patient..i really appreciate the whole team of Nanda Dental Clinic and I will come back again for sure in near future if I have any problem...And I highly Recommend to all the Nanda Dental Clinic Jacaranda Marg DLF Phase 2 Gurgoan  for any type of treatment related to teeth..
reply_text: Thank you so much. I will be sharing your feedback with our entire team 🙏🏻

review:
A thorough & Well Qualified Professional with Friendly nature. He explained the reason for the treatments for the Implants done by him and where he would instead put a Bridge. The appointments given for the treatment were very precise with no Waiting Period. Post dental treatment the Instructions given by him were absolutely crisp & clear. 
I am very impressed with the upkeep of the Clinic and the latest equipment used along with a very well trained staff. At all times the Patient comfort was the Motto.
I shall recommend Nanda Dental Clinic to all my friends and family members and wish Dr.Prashant Nanda a very bright future.
